member.name: T:ExpressionReflect.Fluxera.Storage.Evaluator
member.summary: Enables the partial evaluation of queries.

member.name: T:ExpressionReflect.Fluxera.Storage.Evaluator.Nominator
member.summary: Performs bottom-up analysis to determine which nodes can possibly be part of an evaluated sub-tree.

member.name: T:ExpressionReflect.ExpressionReflectionExecutor
member.summary: An expression visitor that translates the expression tree to reflection calls.

member.name: M:ExpressionReflect.ExpressionReflectionExecutor.Execute(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The entry point for the evaluation.
member.param: Flag, indicating if the expression returns a value. The default is true.

member.name: M:ExpressionReflect.ExpressionReflectionExecutor.GetValueFromStack
member.summary: Gets a single value from the stack.
